trans-unit.source: Describes the characteristics of an argument of an activity to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver egenskapene i et argument av en aktivitet for å kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> class using a name, data type, and argument direction.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et navn, datatype og argumentet retning.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Typen for den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: Retningen for dataflyten via et argument.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> class using a name, data type, argument direction, and a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et navn, datatype, argumentet retningen og en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> kreves for å være bundet til en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen for det <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: Retningen for dataflyten via et argument.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> er påkrevd for å være bundet til en verdi; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> class using a name, data type, argument direction, and a list of overload group names.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et navn, datatype, argumentet retningen og en liste over gruppenavn overbelastning.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen for det <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: Retningen for dataflyten via et argument.

trans-unit.source: The overload groups that apply to this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overbelastning gruppene som gjelder for dette <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> class with a name, data type, argument direction, whether the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value, and a list of overload group names.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> klasse med et navn, datatype, argumentet retningen om det <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> kreves for å være bundet til en verdi og en liste over gruppenavn overbelastning.

trans-unit.source: Required arguments that are unbound result in validation errors that are displayed at design time.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter som ubundet fører valideringsfeil som vises under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.RequiredArgumentAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> is applied to an argument.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true` hvis den <xref:System.Activities.RequiredArgumentAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>brukes på et argument.</xref:System.Activities.RequiredArgumentAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Overload groups can be set on arguments through the <xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Overbelastning grupper kan angis for argumenter via <xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>.</xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen for det <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: Retningen for dataflyten via et argument.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> er påkrevd for å være bundet til en verdi; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The names of the overload groups that apply to this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navn på overbelastning gruppene som gjelder for dette <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction of the data flow through this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter retningen på dataflyten gjennom denne <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: Retningen for dataflyten via et argument.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> using the specified activity context.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> ved å bruke den angitte Aktivitetskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: The current activity context.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende aktivitet kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Activities.Location"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Activities.Location"> </xref> for denne <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The argument location.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The location of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> kreves for å være bundet til en verdi.

trans-unit.source: If an argument is required and not bound to a value a <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException> is thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution, unless overload groups are used and the required arguments of an overload group are bound.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et argument er påkrevd og ikke er bundet til en verdi en <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>forårsakes når med aktivitet er klargjort for kjøring, med mindre overbelastning grupper brukes og argumenter i en overbelastning gruppen er bundet.</xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.OverloadGroupNames%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.OverloadGroupNames%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.OverloadGroupNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> is required to be bound to a value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> må være bundet til en verdi; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the overload groups that this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over overlasten grupper som denne <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref> tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Arguments can be grouped together to form valid overload groups.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter kan grupperes sammen for å danne gyldig overbelastning grupper.

trans-unit.source: OverloadGroupNames identifies the overload groups to which this argument belongs.
trans-unit.target: OverloadGroupNames identifiserer overbelastning-grupper som tilhører dette argumentet.

trans-unit.source: An overload group cannot be a subset or an equivalent set of another overload group.
trans-unit.target: En overbelastning gruppe kan ikke være et delsett eller et tilsvarende sett med en annen overlasting gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The only exception to this rule is a subset that contains only arguments where <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Det eneste unntaket fra denne regelen er et delsett som inneholder bare argumenter der <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>er `false`.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Overload groups can overlap but it is an error if the intersection of the groups contains all the required arguments of one or both the overload groups.
trans-unit.target: Overbelastning grupper kan overlappe, men det er en feil hvis skjæringspunktet mellom gruppene som inneholder alle obligatoriske argumenter i en eller begge overbelastning gruppene.

trans-unit.source: An overload group is considered bound if all the <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments in the group are bound.
trans-unit.target: En gruppe overbelastning anses grense hvis alle de <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>argumenter i gruppen er bundet.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a group has zero <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments and at least one argument bound, then the group is considered bound.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en gruppe har null <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>argumenter og minst ett argument bundet, og deretter gruppen anses grense.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is an error if none of the groups are bound unless one overload group has no <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments in it.
trans-unit.target: Det er en feil hvis ingen av gruppene bundet hvis én overbelastning gruppe har noen <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>argumenter i det.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Binding <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments from more than one overload group is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>argumenter fra mer enn én overbelastning gruppen er ikke tillatt.</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is an error to have more than one overload group bound, that is, all required arguments in one overload group are bound and any argument in another overload group is also bound.
trans-unit.target: Det er en feil med mer enn én overbelastning gruppe bundet, som er, alle argumenter i én overbelastning gruppen er bundet og et argument i en annen overlasting gruppe også er bundet.

trans-unit.source: Any violation of the preceding rules results in a <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException> being thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution.
trans-unit.target: Alle brudd på den foregående regler resultatene i en <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>som et når med aktivitet er klargjort for kjøring.</xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>.</xref:System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A list of overload group names.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gruppenavn overbelastning.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current activity context.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende aktivitet kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
